Class SameGameController

java.lang.Object
com.aoopproject.framework.core.AbstractGameController
com.aoopproject.games.samegame.SameGameController
public class SameGameController extends AbstractGameController
Controller for the SameGame. Currently, it relies mostly on the functionality provided by AbstractGameController. It can be extended if SameGame requires specific controller logic beyond user input processing.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Description copied from class: AbstractGameController
      Starts the main game loop or prepares the game for playing. The base implementation here is conceptual. Concrete controllers might implement a more event-driven approach rather than a blocking loop. This method should be called after AbstractGameController.initializeGame().
      Overrides:
      startGame in class AbstractGameController
